Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api

Interface IPlayer

All Superinterfaces:
ICommandSender, IMessageable
All Known Implementing Classes:
OfflinePlayerSpigot, PlayerSpigot
public interface IPlayer extends ICommandSender
Represents a AnimatedArchitecture player.
Author:
Pim

      Description copied from interface: ICommandSender
      Gets the IPlayer that issued the command.
      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • hasPermission

      CompletableFuture<Boolean> hasPermission(String permission)
      Description copied from interface: ICommandSender
      Checks if this sender has a given permission.
      Specified by:
      hasPermission in interface ICommandSender
      Parameters:
      permission - The permission node to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player has access to the provided permission, otherwise false.

    • hasPermission

      CompletableFuture<PermissionsStatus> hasPermission(CommandDefinition command)
      Description copied from interface: ICommandSender
      Checks if this sender has a given command.

      Both the user permission (See CommandDefinition.getUserPermission()) and the admin permission (See CommandDefinition.getAdminPermission()) are checked.

      Specified by:
      hasPermission in interface ICommandSender
      Parameters:
      command - The CommandDefinition of a command to check.
      Returns:
      A PermissionsStatus that is true if the player has access to the provided permissions, otherwise false for the user and the admin permission nodes respectively.

    • hasProtectionBypassPermission

      boolean hasProtectionBypassPermission()
      Checks if this player has a bypass permission node that allows them to bypass the protection hooks.
      Returns:
      True if this player has permission to bypass the protection hooks.

    • getStructureSizeLimit

      int getStructureSizeLimit()
      Gets the limit for the size of structures this player can create/operate based on their permission.

      Note that this does not take the global limit into account.

      Returns:
      The maximum structure size this player can make/operate measured in number of blocks.

    • getStructureCountLimit

      int getStructureCountLimit()
      Gets the limit for the number of structures this player can own based on their permission.

      Note that this does not take the global limit into account.

      Returns:
      The number of structures this player can own.

    • isOp

      boolean isOp()
      Checks if this player is an OP or not.
      Returns:
      True if the player is an OP.

    • getPlayerData

      default PlayerData getPlayerData()
      Gets a the PlayerData that represents this player. This may or may not be a new object.
      Returns:
      The PlayerData that represents this player.
